name: Survive the void
description:
Made for Godot wild jam 34 on the theme "Space".

In itself, the game is not really fun IMO (a little self-bashing here :) ) but there are a lot of things that could be added.

After having secured oxygen, food is needed, then maybe other survivors, there are other dangers like asteroids, and such. And in the end, maybe we could learn what happened to the planet and find a way to fix it... 

If I ever decide to spend some more time on it, I'll do it in 3d. After having played it a bit in 2d, I think 3d could add something nice too...
